subject: Re: [cc-devel] GStreamer and CC-relevant tags
body:
On Mon, 2007-06-25 at 12:52 +0200, Christian F.K. Schaller wrote:
> Hi Jon and more,
> Looking at that bug it seems Tim is very much on top of it, I mean his
> last comment was just 6 days ago and Mike and Jason just replied over
> the last couple of days. So hopefully this will get merged soon, but I
> don't see a reason for either me or Dave to get involved at this point.
> 
> Christian

Sounds good...thanks for looking at Christian...we are just moving fast
with google summer of code and limited intern time...let me know if
I/CC/we can be of assistance in any assistance... :)

Jon

> On Fri, 2007-06-22 at 15:25 -0700, Jon Phillips wrote:
> > On Fri, 2007-06-22 at 15:04 -0700, Jason Kivlighn wrote:
> > > Here's the bug report where I've submitted a patch to have GStreamer
> > > read the WCOP (License URI) tag:
> > > 
> > > http://bugzilla.gnome.org/show_bug.cgi?id=447000
> > > 
> > > It also allows for reading the WOAF (license verification) tag.  It's
> > > simply a matter of figuring out what GStreamer tags to map them to. 
> > > That's where discussion fizzled out.
> > > 
> > > Cheers,
> > > Jason
> > 
> > Heya Christian and Dave, could you guys look at this patch jason
> > committed. We are trying to push through support for CC licensing and
> > are stuck up somewhere.
> > 
> > Jason, Christian and Dave are both key gstreamer people.
> > 
> > Thanks!
> > 
> > Jon
> > 
--
